preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT `information_schema`.COLUMNS.`IS_NULLABLE` FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE table_name='callactivity' AND column_name='caa_callacttypeno' AND table_schema = DATABASE()

changeSet.sql: update callactivity set caa_callacttypeno = null where caa_callacttypeno = 0

changeSet.author: pavwebdev

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) > 0 from customer where cus_create_date is null or cus_create_date = '0000-00-00'

changeSet.sql: UPDATE customer SET cus_create_date = CASE WHEN cus_became_customer_date IS NOT NULL THEN cus_became_customer_date ELSE '1996-01-01' END WHERE cus_create_date IS NULL OR cus_create_date = '0000-00-00'

changeSet.author: pavwebdev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT `information_schema`.COLUMNS.`IS_NULLABLE` FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE table_name='mail_queue' AND column_name='time_started_sending' AND table_schema = DATABASE()

changeSet.sql: update mail_queue set time_started_sending = null where time_started_sending = '0000-00-00 00:00:00'

changeSet.sql: update problem set pro_consno = null where pro_consno = 0

changeSet.author: pavwebdev

changeSet.sql: update problem set pro_fixed_consno = null where pro_fixed_consno = 0

changeSet.author: pavwebdev
changeSet.sql: update problem set pro_fixed_date = null where pro_fixed_date = '0000-00-00 00:00:00'

changeSet.author: pavwebdev
changeSet.sql: UPDATE problem SET problem.`pro_date_raised` = (SELECT MIN(callactivity.`caa_date`) FROM callactivity WHERE callactivity.`caa_problemno` = problem.`pro_problemno`) WHERE pro_date_raised IS NULL

changeSet.author: pavwebdev
changeSet.sql: update problem set pro_complete_date = null where pro_complete_date = '0000-00-00'

changeSet.author: pavwebdev
changeSet.sql: update problem set pro_hide_from_customer_flag = 'N' where pro_hide_from_customer_flag = '' or pro_hide_from_customer_flag is null

changeSet.sql: update problem set pro_alarm_time = null where pro_alarm_time = ''

changeSet.sql: update problem set pro_contract_cuino = null where pro_contract_cuino = 0

changeSet.sql: update problem set activityCategoryID = null where activityCategoryID = 0

changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX idx_con_custno_con_first_name_con_last_name ON contactAuditLog (con_custno, con_first_name, con_last_name);

column.name: caa_awaiting_customer_response_flag
column.remarks: If so then exclude this from time duration calculations

column.name: caa_logging_error_flag
column.remarks: Was there an error when logging this activity

changeSet.author: pavwebdev
changeSet.sql: update custype set cty_ctypeno = 25 where cty_desc = "Legacy"

changeSet.author: pavwebdev
changeSet.sql: update password set archivedAt = if(archivedAt = '0000-00-00 00:00:00', null, archivedAt), archivedBy = if(archivedBy = '', null, archivedBy), serviceID = if(serviceID = 0, null, serviceID)

changeSet.author: pavwebdev
changeSet.sql: update custitem set initialContractLength = 12 where initialContractLength is null
